author: Chih-Wei Hsu and Cheng-Ru Lin
title: A Comparison of Methods for Multi-class Support Vector Machines
venue: Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering National Taiwan University
window: iris, wine, glass, and vowel. Those problems had already been tested in [27]. From Statlog collection we choose all multi-class datasets: vehicle segment, dna, satimage, letter, and shuttle. Note that except problem dna we scale all training data to be in [-1, 1]. Then test data are adjusted using the same linear transformation.
